name: nearby
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool places_nearby_a_coordinates.
Tool description: Find places nearby a given coordinates.
API description: Returns nearby places sorted by distance from the origin coordinates in ascending order.

Returns up to 60 places per request.

categories.description: Categories of places to search for. Default is 'catering.cafe'.

radius.description: Search radius in meters. Default is 500, maximum is 50000.
